Class Block

java.lang.Object
Block
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, MouseListener, Serializable, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
LogoBlock, MazeBlock
public abstract class Block extends Object implements Serializable, MouseListener, ActionListener
Abstract class used for Maze Block and Logo Blocks in the maze. Objects of this class represent the cells within a maze.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Block

      public Block(int[] location, int blockIndex, Boolean clearWalls)
      Constructs and initialises new Block
      Parameters:
      location - int[x,y] x,y location of block on maze
      blockIndex - sets the block index for the maze map ArrayList of block.
      clearWalls - sets the default value for the walls to be cleared (true / inactive) or set (false / active)
